data.fullContent: Andrew has always loved music but never knew how much until he found his new favorite band. He saw them in concert and was blown away. He couldn't believe they had been playing together so long and that he had never heard of them before. In the past, he had listened to a lot of different kinds of music, but this was the first time he had ever heard anything like this band. He went straight to his computer and bought every one of their CDs and posters he could find. He also watches their videos on YouTube and follows them on Twitter. Every Monday night, he looks forward to their new video.

q1.translation: 安德鲁一直热爱音乐，但在他找到自己最喜欢的新乐队之前，他从不知道自己有多喜欢音乐。他看到他们在一起演出，被震撼了。
q1.front: Andrew has always loved music but never knew how much until he found his new favorite band. He saw them in concert and was blown away.
q1.content: Andrew has always ____ music but never ____ how much until he found his new ____ band. He saw them in concert and was blown away.

q2.translation: 安德鲁一直热爱音乐，但在他找到自己最喜欢的新乐队之前，他从不知道自己有多喜欢音乐。他看到他们在一起演出，被震撼了。他不敢相信他们在一起玩了这么久，而他以前却从未听说过他们。在过去，他听过许多不同类型的音乐，但这是他第一次听到这样的乐队。他径直走到电脑前，买了所有他能找到的cd和海报。他还在YouTube上观看他们的视频，并在Twitter上关注他们。每周一晚上，他都很期待他们的新视频。
q2.front: Andrew has always loved music but never knew how much until he found his new favorite band. He saw them in concert and was blown away.
q2.middle: He couldn't believe they had been playing together so long and that he had never heard of them before.
q2.ending: In the past, he had listened to a lot of different kinds of music, but this was the first time he had ever heard anything like this band. He went straight to his computer and bought every one of their CDs and posters he could find. He also watches their videos on YouTube and follows them on Twitter. Every Monday night, he looks forward to their new video.

options.sentence: Since the band is all in high school, Andrew figured that he would never meet them in person.
He couldn't believe they had been playing together so long and that he had never heard of them before.
He looked around the room but couldn't see any clues as to why the music was playing.
However, he was surprised to find his musical tastes had changed after he hung out with his friends.
